statements: SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE id = 5;
SELECT software_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id = 10;
SELECT id, software_version, update_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT software_version FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id = 7 AND update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_updates FROM software_updates;
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT software_version, vehicle_id FROM software_updates WHERE software_version LIKE 'v1.%';
SELECT id, software_version, vehicle_id FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT software_version, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM software_updates GROUP BY software_version HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT software_version, MAX(update_date) AS latest_update FROM software_updates GROUP BY software_version ORDER BY latest_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'App1'
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT vehicle_model, battery_capacity FROM electric_vehicle_systems WHERE battery_capacity > 100
SELECT software_name, version, update_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_model, software_version FROM electric_vehicle_systems WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE version = '1.5';
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_systems WHERE battery_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY battery_capacity DESC;
SELECT vehicle_model, battery_capacity, last_update_date FROM electric_vehicle_systems WHERE last_update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_update_date ASC;
SELECT software_name, version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT software_name, version, vehicle_model FROM software_updates INNER JOIN electric_vehicle_systems ON software_updates.vehicle_id = electric_vehicle_systems.vehicle_id ORDER BY vehicle_model ASC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM system_updates WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT id, vin, make, model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT software_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id = 123 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
SELECT software_version, software_update_id, status FROM system_updates WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY update_id DESC;
SELECT vehicles.make, software_updates.software_version FROM vehicles INNER JOIN software_updates ON vehicles.id = software_updates.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles;
SELECT model, manufacturer, year FROM electric_vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT model, year FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT component_name, component_type FROM vehicle_components WHERE component_type = 'Battery' ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicles WHERE year >= 2018 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM electric_vehicles WHERE manufacturer='Tesla';
SELECT * FROM software_updates JOIN electric_vehicles ON software_updates.vehicle_id = electric_vehicles.id WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT component_type FROM vehicle_components;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM monitoring_logs WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT id FROM electric_vehicles WHERE manufacturer='BMW');
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE year < 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, last_updated FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_make DESC, vehicle_model ASC
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, year FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT update_id, update_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE vehicle_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c'
SELECT u.update_id, u.update_version, u.update_date, v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model FROM software_updates u INNER JOIN vehicles v ON u.vehicle_id = v.id
SELECT * FROM software_errors WHERE error_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY error_date
